trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_GENBU_000_050<tab>Oh, my friend! It is so very good to see you again! How do you fare these days? Little has changed with me since last we met. Genbu, as you might imagine, is ever the demanding taskmaster...

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_GENBU_000_051<tab>(-Wizened Voice-)<var 1A 02 /var>Am<var 1A 01 /var> I, Soroban? I gave my permission for you to leave the temple to go frolic about in that ridiculous rabbit suit, did I not? Mind you, I am already beginning to regret my decision. At this rate, it will be a thousand years before you are ready to succeed me!

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_GENBU_000_052<tab>I understand this, Master Genbu. Truly, I do! I assure you that this is all part of my mission to expand my horizons and deepen my knowledge of this world, that I might one day protect the Ruby Sea as you do.

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_GENBU_000_053<tab>(-Wizened Voice-)Ohohoho! As you can see, this young one is as spirited as ever. It is good to see you in fine fettle as well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_GENBU_000_054<tab>Ohohoho! How long has it been since I traveled to these shores? No matter─I must find myself a great warrior, lest the Ruby Sea be bathed in the flames of destruction...

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SEIRYU_000_055<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It has been some time, has it not? When I heard of your involvement in these festivities, I was compelled to come and see for myself. I was, however, burdened with an overgrown kitten who can neither swim nor fly, making the journey here troublesome indeed.

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SEIRYU_000_056<tab>Had I known these suits would be so...constrictive, I may have stayed at Hells' Lid. Were I to use my powers to transform you into a snake, you might better understand my struggle.
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SEIRYU_000_057<tab>...But I jest. Such ill treatment of a warrior of your stature would incur the ire of my fellow auspices.
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SEIRYU_000_058<tab>Similarly, were any of them foolish enough to give you cause for consternation, my retribution against them would be swift and merciless.
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SEIRYU_000_059<tab>On that fateful day, I vowed that never again would I associate with mortals. And yet, here I am...

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BYAKKO_000_060<tab>Well, well, old friend. I was not expecting to see <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> in a place like this. Do you not remember my final words to you when you left the temple?

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BYAKKO_000_061<tab>I told you that you were welcome to return anytime you wish. And yet, you spurn our invitation. I am filled with such profound loneliness, I can feel my aramitama swell with anger and rage─!
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BYAKKO_000_062<tab>...'Tis a joke, friend. Perhaps my companions would express such sentiments, but not I.
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BYAKKO_000_063<tab>And yet, I cannot deny that we would welcome your company. After all, you are one of the few mortals in this world that we see as a friend.
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BYAKKO_000_064<tab>Mortals are honorable creatures, indeed... I must keep my fury in check, lest I visit upon them death and destruction they do not deserve.

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SUZAKU_000_065<tab>Let me tell you of a dream I had. In it, I was standing in a great manse, with countless visions of my beloved Tenzen dancing about me. It was so curious, and so deeply beautiful...
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SUZAKU_000_066<tab>I imagine that you are thinking that I haven't changed a bit. And yet, I assure you that I have come far since last we met.

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SUZAKU_000_067<tab>Yes, I understand that I cannot allow myself to be consumed by the past, lest I lose sight of those precious individuals who stand beside me here in the present.

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SUZAKU_000_068<tab>And yet, I have vowed to do all that I can to honor his memory, and bring happiness and good fortune to those around me, much as my beloved once did for me.
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SUZAKU_000_069<tab>To think that I might have enjoyed these festivities with my one and only beloved, had only I not been so weak and powerless...
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ZUIZYU_000_070<tab>(-Feline Purr-)Ah, there you are. Kamaitachi here has been whining all day about just how much he missed you.
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ZUIZYU_000_071<tab>(-Weaselly Voice-)Hey, that's not true! I just said, wouldn't it be nice if <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> happened to stop by?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ZUIZYU_000_072<tab>(-Canine Growl-)Silence and stop moving, fool, lest I rend you limb from limb! Can't you see that Nue can barely hold us up as is?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ZUIZYU_000_073<tab>(-Red Panda's Voice-)Mmf... How much longer do we have to stay like this!?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ZUIZYU_000_074<tab>(-Feline Purr-)Mortals, mortals everywhere...
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_TATARU_000_100<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Fancy meeting you here!

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_TATARU_000_101<tab>I was just stopping by to pay a visit to one of our contacts in the Twin Adders, when out of nowhere this fellow in a rabbit suit came by and handed me this egg. Isn't it pretty?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_TATARU_000_102<tab>It just made me so happy that I figured, why not return the favor? The others won't miss me if I'm only gone for a while, no?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_TATARU_000_103<tab>A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to you! Isn't this such a lovely festival?

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_LANDENEL_000_150<tab>Bah! Why did no one tell me that I'd have to wear this ridiculous outfit <var 1A 02 /var>before<var 1A 01 /var> I volunteered for security duty? And what are the rest of you doing here?

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ALKAZOLKA_000_151<tab>Ever since Setoto was cured of the disease, I've been taking her all around as part of my training. It's such a relief to know she'll not be the target of any overeager bounty hunters anymore!

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_SETOTO_000_152<tab>Oh, I simply can't express how wonderful it feels to walk along Alka's side with not a care in the world! Landenel, sir...what do you think, seeing me as an ordinary girl like this?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_LANDENEL_000_153<tab>Er, you may want to take another look at yourself...
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BEATINE_000_200<tab>Ah, hello there, child...

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BEATINE_000_201<tab>Mayhap you can assist me with something. I've crafted the most lovely gilded eggs from the finest of wood, yet not a single boy or girl has shown an interest in my creations. Whatever do you suppose might be the matter?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_GAIRHARD_000_202<tab>Ahem... How many times do I have to tell you? Maybe you'd have more luck if you put that godsdamned saw down before you approached the children!

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_BEATINE_000_203<tab>I've crafted the most lovely gilded eggs from the finest of wood, yet not a single boy or girl has shown an interest in my creations. Whatever do you suppose might be the matter?
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_GAIRHARD_000_204<tab>Ahem... How many times do I have to tell you? Maybe you'd have more luck if you put that godsdamned saw down before you approached the children!
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ADKIRAGH_000_250<tab>Well, hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. How do you like my outfit? Quite stylish, wouldn't you agree?

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ADKIRAGH_000_251<tab>Wait─don't tell me. I can tell at a glance what you're thinking. “Why, Adkiragh,” you muse. “Whyever are you dressed as a dapper swine rather than a handsome hare?”

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ADKIRAGH_000_252<tab>And to that, I answer: recently, generous adventurers have given me all manner of curious costumes, from toads to Namazu and more. But I will not be swayed by fleeting trends of fashion. No, I have a style all my own, and I will stay true to myself to the end! Did I mention that suckling pig is one of the most popular items on the menu at the Hard Place?

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_ADKIRAGH_000_253<tab>Far have I traveled in search of the finest ingredients! Yes, somewhere in the Shroud lies the exact combination of herbs and spices that will create a dish that will bring in customers from across the realm, and at long last bring the Hard Place back from the brink!
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_NERO_000_300<tab>You're here, too? ...This? Why, I'm just a harmless, cute little red bunny rabbit, of course. What does it look like to you?

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_NERO_000_301<tab>Well, truth be told, I have made a <var 1A 02 /var>few<var 1A 01 /var> enhancements. For example, it can spit a piping hot jet of coffee straight from its mouth. <var 1A 02 /var>Good<var 1A 01 /var> coffee, too, unlike the swill brewed with a certain Mark XIV Thermo-something-or-another.

TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_NERO_000_302<tab>Forgotten about me, have you, Garlond? Heh... You'll remember all too well when my cute little bunny shows up with an extra-large Archon egg specially crafted just for you...
TEXT_FESESTADDBUNNY_00665_NERO_000_303<tab>I do believe you'll especially enjoy the present inside. A retractable turret that will leave no doubt which one of us is the true master of magitek...
